data.name: Battle Bands Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
11 incendiary tracks created for Battle Bands : Rock & Roll Deckbuilder by Fat Bard!

At the highest level, this soundtrack is a road trip journey through the subgenres of Rock & Roll with frequent stops for snacks (and battles) at Riff City's finest locales.

The alternative rock-inspired opening track "Battie" sets the energy and pace for the fun ride. From the power pop instant-classic of "Arcade” to a blues rock “Train” ride, with room for ska, punk, and metal along the way and concluding with an epic prog rock finale, join us for this homage to rock & roll with a game soundtrack unlike any you’ve heard before.

Uniquely composed to evoke the exhilaration of a gig with your favorite band, whether at a seedy basement show or a dramatic arena performance, the Battle Bands soundscape not only shapes the game, but also fully rocks all on its own.
